repnme.cdata!:
Ceylon - Second Development Finance
            Corporation Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would enable DFCC
            to finance the foreign exchange costs of specific investment
            projects undertaken by private industrial, agricultural and
            commercial enterprises in Ceylon.
